name: Noodle Fight
description:
This is a game made for weekly game jam 156, theme was noodle

https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-156

How to play:
- Use wasd to move your noodle man if you are playing against AI.
- In case of two player game, player2 should use arrow keys.

Game made by:
- Aljaž Podgornik (greyRocket)
- Anže Kristan (Aekai)
- Marko Laharnar ( https://laharnar.github.io/ )

Legally aquired assets:
- Song from:
      https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/rpg-battle-themes/
- Sfx made with BFXR
